name: Color Soul: Memories
description:
Game Features

  • A new indie game experience, with new characters, a new world, new music, and a new story.
  • A densely packed overworld with three areas to explore!
  • A mystery to solve.
  • A colorless world with colors to restore.
  • Lore galore!
  • A unique art style not found in any other game.
  • Minigames, like fishing, tile puzzles, enemy battles, and more!
  • A secret or two.
  • 1-2 hours of playtime!

Credits


Game by Evan Streblow
Programming
Evan Streblow
Art
Evan Streblow (Tiles, Overworld, Items)
Ethan Streblow (Banner Art, Thumbnail Art, Basic Polygons)
Rodney Rogers (Segan Light Font)
Music
Ethan Streblow
